name: ui-router-architecture
description: Architecture overview demo for Angular UI-Router

scripts.start: npm run watch:compile & npm run serve
scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git rebase master && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && echo 'If there are any updated modules:' && echo 'git commit -am update_libs' && echo 'git rebase -i' && echo && echo 'Finally:' && echo 'git push origin gh-pages:gh-pages --force' && echo 'git checkout master'
